name: Music_2333.wav
caption: This clip features a live recording of low quality. The song is mixed into a video clip. The sound of crowd cheering is heard. The song features a male voice using a vocoder. The song is in the techno genre. The percussion is programmed and plays a techno beat. The bass plays simple root notes of chords. Synth bursts are played at the beginning and at the end of the song. The referee whistle is heard toward the middle of the clip.
